snippet.title: 1-BIT RETURN - iOS Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
▶Like for RETRO STYLE 👾
▶Download on iOS: https://appsto.re/gb/iBgolb.i
▶Weblink: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/1-bit-return/id1261987528?mt=8

This is a brand new game, coming Summer 2017.

1-Bit Return is a Super Fun, Retro Isometric Platformer.
Its Classic Style Features Retro PixelArt with Chiptune Sound Effects.

Face 25 Arcade Challenges or Compete with the World in an Endless Adventure.

Over 40 Randomised Worlds, 25 Challenges with Unlockable Characters and Much More.

It's not as easy as it looks, but you can be the judge of that...


▶See my iOS Games: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/developer/id991783033

Welcome to my brand new channel, dedicated to Indie Games, just like this one.
If you love games or youtube, please be sure to like or share this video.
If you want to see more, please hit that subscribe button :)

Thanks for watching ❤️

▶Find me
▶Twitter: @AaroArts
▶Instagram: @AaroArts

Credits:
►Aaro Arts has been granted permission by Matthew Huffaker to use TeknoAxe music, which is hosted on http://www.teknoaxe.com, and is represented on the youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe under the terms of CC (Creative Commons) 4.0 license.
